item.title: Getting Data from Github
item.description: For every data project, youâ€™ll need to get your data from some source. This short blog post will guide you through a few different ways of pulling data from a github repo. A. Download from link Step 1: Install and load downloader package You can download the data from a direct link by using the downloader package. Install the package and use the library() function to load the package:
